requirement_tested: Display a list of property listings on the homepage
user_persona: A potential homebuyer browsing available properties.
user_goal: To view multiple property listings on the homepage in a visually appealing grid format.

narrative_steps.title: Visiting Homepage
narrative_steps.description: Sarah opens the real estate website and expects to see property listings immediately.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the homepage URL.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A grid of property cards is displayed with thumbnails, titles, prices, and locations. The background is alice blue and all card elements are styled with steel blue.

narrative_steps.title: Interacting with Property Card
narrative_steps.description: Sarah sees an interesting property and clicks on its card to learn more.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a property card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The page navigates to the property detail page without a full page reload (SPA navigation).

narrative_steps.title: Scrolling for More Listings
narrative_steps.description: After viewing some properties, Sarah scrolls down to see more listings.
narrative_steps.action: Scroll to the bottom of the property listing grid.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Additional property listings load automatically through infinite scroll functionality.

requirement_tested: Show detailed property information on individual property pages
user_persona: A serious buyer wanting to know everything about a specific property.
user_goal: To view comprehensive details of a selected property including images, specifications, and nearby places.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Property Details
narrative_steps.description: John clicks on a property card from the homepage to see its full details.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a property listing card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: John is taken to a detailed property page showing large images in a carousel, price, location, specs, description, and nearby places. Background is alice blue with steel blue text.

narrative_steps.title: Navigating Through Images
narrative_steps.description: John wants to see more photos of the property and interacts with the image carousel.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the next arrow in the image carousel.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The displayed image changes to the next one in the sequence.

narrative_steps.title: Exploring Nearby Places
narrative_steps.description: John hovers over map markers to understand what's close to the property.
narrative_steps.action: Hover over a marker representing a nearby place.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A tooltip appears showing the name of the place and its distance from the property.

requirement_tested: Implement a search bar for users to search properties by keywords
user_persona: A user looking for properties matching specific criteria quickly.
user_goal: To find properties using keyword searches like 'downtown apartment'.

narrative_steps.title: Locating Search Bar
narrative_steps.description: Emily notices a search bar at the top of the homepage and decides to use it.
narrative_steps.action: Identify the search bar with magnifying glass icon.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A prominent search bar is visible with placeholder text 'Search properties...' and steel blue border against alice blue background.

narrative_steps.title: Entering Keywords
narrative_steps.description: Emily types 'luxury downtown condo' into the search field.
narrative_steps.action: Type 'luxury downtown condo' into the search input field.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Text appears in the search box as she types.

narrative_steps.title: Initiating Search
narrative_steps.description: Emily presses Enter to submit her search query.
narrative_steps.action: Press Enter key after entering the search term.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Property listings update to show only those matching the keywords in title, description, or location.

requirement_tested: Provide filter options for users to refine property searches
user_persona: A meticulous buyer who has very specific housing preferences.
user_goal: To narrow down property choices using various filters such as price range and number of bedrooms.

narrative_steps.title: Opening Filter Panel
narrative_steps.description: Michael looks for ways to refine his search and finds the filter sidebar.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the filter toggle/control to reveal the filter panel.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A collapsible sidebar filter panel opens, showing categories like Price Range, Location, Property Type, Bedrooms, and Bathrooms, styled with steel blue and alice blue.

narrative_steps.title: Setting Price Range
narrative_steps.description: Michael adjusts the price slider to match his budget.
narrative_steps.action: Drag the price range slider handles to set minimum and maximum values.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Min/max price values update in real-time as he drags the slider.

narrative_steps.title: Applying Filters
narrative_steps.description: After selecting several filters, Michael applies them to update the property list.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Apply Filters' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The property listings update to reflect only those matching all applied filter conditions.

requirement_tested: Fetch all property data dynamically from backend APIs
user_persona: A developer testing if the frontend properly retrieves live data.
user_goal: To ensure that all property information comes from dynamic API calls rather than hardcoded content.

narrative_steps.title: Loading Property Listings
narrative_steps.description: When the app starts, it should fetch property listings from the backend.
narrative_steps.action: Load the homepage which mounts the property listing component.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: An API call is made to /api/properties endpoint and the returned data populates the property grid.

narrative_steps.title: Updating After Filtering
narrative_steps.description: Changing filter settings should trigger new data fetching.
narrative_steps.action: Select a bedroom count filter and apply it.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Another API request is sent with updated filter parameters and the UI reflects the filtered results.

requirement_tested: Connect backend to external PostgreSQL database using provided environment variables
user_persona: A DevOps engineer verifying backend database connectivity.
user_goal: To confirm that the backend service connects correctly to the PostgreSQL database using predefined environment variables.

narrative_steps.title: Starting Backend Service
narrative_steps.description: The backend application initializes and attempts to connect to the database.
narrative_steps.action: Start the backend server process.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The backend successfully establishes a connection to the PostgreSQL database using DB_HOST=localhost, DB_PORT=5432, etc.

narrative_steps.title: Executing Database Query
narrative_steps.description: An API endpoint is hit which requires querying the database.
narrative_steps.action: Make a GET request to /api/properties.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The backend queries the connected PostgreSQL database and returns property records stored in the 'properties' table.

requirement_tested: Set up frontend to consume data via RESTful API endpoints
user_persona: A frontend developer ensuring proper communication between client and server.
user_goal: To verify that the frontend makes correct RESTful API requests to retrieve property data.

narrative_steps.title: Initializing HTTP Client
narrative_steps.description: Frontend components initialize with preconfigured API client.
narrative_steps.action: Mount a component that needs property data.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Axios or Fetch client is initialized with base URL pointing to the backend server.

narrative_steps.title: Making Data Requests
narrative_steps.description: UI interaction triggers a data fetch operation.
narrative_steps.action: Trigger a property listing load event.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: HTTP GET request is made to /api/properties endpoint and receives a successful JSON response with property data.

requirement_tested: Support browsing property listings without page reloads where applicable
user_persona: A fast-browsing user navigating between property listings and details.
user_goal: To seamlessly move between property summaries and full details without experiencing full page reloads.

narrative_steps.title: Navigating Listings
narrative_steps.description: Emma clicks on different property cards to compare them.
narrative_steps.action: Click on multiple property cards consecutively.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Each click navigates to the respective property detail page using SPA routing without full page reloads.

narrative_steps.title: Using Browser Navigation
narrative_steps.description: Emma uses the browser back button to revisit previous pages.
narrative_steps.action: Click the browser back button after visiting a few property detail pages.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Navigation occurs between previously viewed pages without triggering full page reloads.

requirement_tested: Allow users to click on a property listing to view its full details
user_persona: A curious user wanting quick access to detailed property info.
user_goal: To access detailed property information by clicking on any property listing.

narrative_steps.title: Clicking Property Listing
narrative_steps.description: David sees a property he likes and wants to get more information.
narrative_steps.action: Click anywhere on a property listing card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: He is redirected to the property detail page identified by the unique property ID in the URL.

narrative_steps.title: Opening in New Tab
narrative_steps.description: David prefers to keep the current page open while checking out another property.
narrative_steps.action: Right-click on a property listing card and choose 'Open link in new tab'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The property detail page opens in a new browser tab or window.

requirement_tested: Enable filtering properties by attributes such as price, location, or type
user_persona: A selective renter needing precise property matches.
user_goal: To filter property listings based on specific attributes like price range and location.

narrative_steps.title: Adjusting Filter Controls
narrative_steps.description: Lisa modifies several filter controls to match her needs.
narrative_steps.action: Change the location dropdown selection and adjust bedroom radio buttons.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Selected filter values update accordingly in the UI.

narrative_steps.title: Real-Time Filtering
narrative_steps.description: As Lisa changes filters, she expects immediate updates.
narrative_steps.action: Modify any active filter control.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: New API requests are triggered with updated filter parameters, refreshing the displayed listings instantly.

narrative_steps.title: Resetting Filters
narrative_steps.description: Lisa wants to start fresh with no filters applied.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Reset Filters' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All filter selections are cleared and the original unfiltered property list is shown again.

requirement_tested: Ensure consistent styling with alice blue background and steel blue elements
user_persona: A designer reviewing visual consistency across the site.
user_goal: To verify that the entire website maintains a uniform color scheme throughout.

narrative_steps.title: Checking Overall Design
narrative_steps.description: Alex inspects the general look of the homepage.
narrative_steps.action: View the homepage layout and primary interactive elements.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Background is consistently alice blue (#F0F8FF) and interactive elements, borders, and headings are styled in steel blue (#4682B4).

narrative_steps.title: Testing Interactive States
narrative_steps.description: Alex tests how interactive elements respond to user actions.
narrative_steps.action: Hover over buttons and focus on form inputs.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Elements slightly change shade on hover but retain their steel blue base color; focused elements maintain steel blue styling with clear focus indicators.

requirement_tested: Configure package.json to support `npm run install:all` for both frontend and backend
user_persona: A team member setting up the project locally for the first time.
user_goal: To install dependencies for both frontend and backend parts of the application using a single command.

narrative_steps.title: Running Install Command
narrative_steps.description: Jamie clones the repository and runs the combined install script.
narrative_steps.action: Execute `npm run install:all` in the root directory.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Dependencies for both frontend and backend are installed sequentially without errors.

requirement_tested: Configure package.json to support `npm run dev` to start both frontend and backend concurrently
user_persona: A developer starting up the local development environment.
user_goal: To launch both frontend and backend development servers with one command.

narrative_steps.title: Launching Development Servers
narrative_steps.description: Taylor wants to begin working on the project and starts the dev environment.
narrative_steps.action: Run `npm run dev` from the root folder.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Both frontend and backend development servers start concurrently, displaying logs from each in the same terminal session.

requirement_tested: Implement responsive design for usability across devices
user_persona: A mobile user accessing the site on a smartphone.
user_goal: To navigate and interact with the website smoothly regardless of device screen size.

narrative_steps.title: Resizing Viewport
narrative_steps.description: Patricia resizes her browser window to simulate smaller screens.
narrative_steps.action: Manually resize the browser window to mobile dimensions.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Layout adjusts automatically, reorganizing elements for optimal viewing on smaller screensâ€”grid becomes single column, filter sidebar turns into a collapsible drawer.

narrative_steps.title: Interacting on Mobile
narrative_steps.description: Patricia taps on touch targets designed for finger interaction.
narrative_steps.action: Tap on property cards and filter controls using touchscreen.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Controls respond appropriately with adequate spacing and sizing suitable for touch interaction.

requirement_tested: Include error handling for failed API requests or missing data
user_persona: An end-user encountering network issues during usage.
user_goal: To receive informative feedback when something goes wrong with data retrieval.

narrative_steps.title: Simulating API Failure
narrative_steps.description: Network issue causes an API call to fail unexpectedly.
narrative_steps.action: Trigger a property listing fetch when backend is unreachable.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Instead of broken UI, a clear error message is displayed along with a retry option.

narrative_steps.title: Handling Missing Data
narrative_steps.description: Some property entries may lack required information.
narrative_steps.action: Receive a property record with missing essential fields.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Placeholders or notifications appear in sections where data is missing, preventing blank or malformed display areas.
